body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Edward Barnes and the customer's name is Katherine King.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling MetaCar. My name is Edward Barnes, and I am here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Edward. I’m Katherine King. I need some help with my car rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Katherine! I’d be happy to help you with your car rental. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just a bit confused about the payment process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Katherine. Can I please get your phone number to pull up your rental information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My email is katherine.king at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Katherine. Now, let’s take a look at your payment options.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Great, I appreciate your help, Edward.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, Katherine. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
